short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables shortcut keys on your favorite web-apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't waste time clicking around if you're doing the same things everyday, time to be productive.

Shortkits are keyboard shortcuts for your favorite websites, don't waste any more time clicking around when you can do what you have to from your keyboard. 

Save that click!
